hero.subtitle: OFFENSIVE SECURITY / PENETRATION TESTER / RED TEAM

about.intro: Offensive security professional with 1+ year of specialized experience in Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing (VAPT).
about.paragraph1: Focused on web applications, APIs, and Android security. Proven track record in discovering and exploiting critical vulnerabilities across diverse attack surfaces.
about.paragraph2: Passionate about red team operations, security automation, and continuous research in emerging threat vectors. Active contributor to cybersecurity community through CTF platforms and open-source security tooling.

education.degree: Bachelor of Vocation in Software Development

highlights: Maintained 99.9% network uptime for SMB clients through proactive infrastructure monitoring
Reduced hardware failure incidents by 15% through systematic preventive maintenance schedules
Deployed hardened Linux server environments with optimized boot processes and secure partition schemes
Executed comprehensive Web Application Penetration Testing identifying high-severity vulnerabilities across 10+ production applications
Conducted in-depth API Security Assessments targeting RESTful and GraphQL endpoints
Performed extensive Android Application Security Testing identifying client-side vulnerabilities
Engineered comprehensive penetration testing reports with CVSS-based risk scoring
Collaborated with development teams resulting in 25% improvement in overall security posture
Developed automation scripts reducing tool configuration time by 50%+
Enhanced user engagement metrics by 20% through comprehensive UI/UX redesign
Accelerated development velocity by implementing reusable component architecture
